title: Bromantic Getaway
description: Can a vacation for two to Antigua turn this "bromance" into the real deal?Spencer Abrams has dated a string of hot women. Sure, it’s never worked out but that’s because he hasn’t met the right one. It has nothing to do with how close he is to his gay best friend. He’s straight.Isn’t he?When an off-hand comment sends him tumbling into the realization he's in love with his best friend, he turns a romantic vacation meant for his ex into a getaway with Devin—and a chance at the love that’s always been right in front of them.
author: Brigham Vaughn
